# Asking (song)

"Asking" is a song by English based, Australian musician Sonny Fodera and American DJ, record producer MK, featuring vocalist Clementine Douglas. The song was released on 7 July 2023.
The song peaked inside the UK Singles Chart top ten, becoming the first top ten in that territory for Sonny Fodera and Clementine Douglas and MK's second.
